alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 3:00PM MST until June 23 at 3:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 345 PM MST. * At 300 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Casa Grande, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chandler, Casa Grande, Sun Lakes, Queen Creek, Blackwater, Chandler Heights, San Tan Valley, Seville, Bapchule, Olberg, Arizola, San Tan Mountain Park, Sacaton and Santan. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 172 and 202. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 164 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 137 and 162. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
